entry.title: [GRA][Web Hosting] - Delay in processing requests for offer changes
entry.content:
Nov 14, 19:32 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 14/11/2024 10:05 UTC
End time : 14/11/2024 19:28 UTC
Service impact : Some slowness can appear on upgrade and downgrade on change offer task launch on manager
Root cause : Customers experienced latency when changing offer tasks on web hosting.
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Nov 14, 16:00 UTC
Update - The incident is still ongoing. We would like to assure you that our teams are doing their utmost to resolve this situation as quickly as possible.
As soon as the situation evolves or the incident is resolved, we will keep you informed.

Thank you for your understanding

Nov 14, 11:10 UTC
Update - You may experience latency when changing offer tasks on your web hosting. However, please be assured that any such task will be processed within 24 hours of being taken into account.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding and patience as we work to resolve this issue. Our team is doing everything possible to address this concern and we will keep you updated on our progress.

Nov 14, 10:27 UTC

As soon as the situation evolves or the incident is resolved, we will keep you informed.
